## Tree
```{r}

library(ISLR)
library(rpart)
library(tidyverse)
set.seed(1)

op = read_csv("data/clean_data.csv")

op = op %>%
  dplyr::select(-X1, -State, -Abrev, -MH_Spending, -Op_Prescribers1, -Homeless, -Alldrug_OD) %>% 
  mutate(Med_Exp= as.factor(Med_Exp)) %>% 
  mutate(Homeless_t = as.numeric(Homeless_t))






data(OJ)
train <- sample(1:nrow(OJ), 800)
oj.train <- OJ[train,]
oj.test <- OJ[-train,]

set.seed(1)
rpart.oj <- rpart(Purchase ~., OJ, subset=train)
rpart.oj
printcp(rpart.oj) 
plotcp(rpart.oj)

rpart.oj2 <- rpart(Purchase ~., OJ, subset=train,
                  control = rpart.control(cp = 0.092))

printcp(rpart.oj2)


```
